sub_title: IT DevOps Competent Engineer at ING, COBOL Programmer, MicroFocus Developer, Azure fundamentals & ISTQB certified
summary:
A post graduate professional with 8 years of development, testing and functional experience in Mainframe 
         based Environment across multiple domains like HealthCare and Banking.
 	ISTQB® Certified - Agile extension and Foundation level both.
 	Currently, working in Mainframes Payment Team as IT devops competent Engineer in ING.
 	Well versed with technical languages like COBOL, JCL, DB2, Endevor. PLI, IMS.
        Good understanding of Microfocus Cobol, ESMAC.
 	Nice understanding of complete software development life cycle.
 	Expertise in Manual Testing.
 	Well versed in in Black Box Testing.
 	Have good knowledge of advance methodology followed in the STLC.
 	Extensive work experience in Regression Testing, Functional testing, and Integration testing.
 	Good Technical Analysis Skills with ability to understand and translate business associated challenges 
        with an IT solution.
 	Keen to learn new technologies.
 	Good communication skills and self-motivated.
 	Ability to quickly adapt new technologies.

certifications.name: Mainframe Application Programmer - COBOL Programming - Experienced
Interskill - Mainframe Application Programmer - DB2 Programming

projects.title: Wellmark - Blue Cross Blue Shield
projects.description:
The Blue Cross and Blue Shield brands are the US nation's oldest and largest family of health benefits companies and the most recognized brands in the health insurance industry. The Blue Cross Blue Shield Association, Wellmark is part of a trusted national network that insures more than 100 million people. That's nearly 1/3 of all Americans.

Responsibilities:

 	Preparing test scenarios, test scripts and executing them to ensure correctness of the      
        functionality.
 	Performed the functional, GUI testing.
 	Performed Unit, System, Integration and Regression Testing.
 	Validating and documentation of defects.
 	Performed testing using AGILE methodology.

contributors.headline: IT DevOps Competent Engineer at ING, COBOL Programmer, MicroFocus Developer, Azure fundamentals & ISTQB certified

projects.title: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Rhode Island
projects.description:
Blue Cross & Blue Shield of Rhode Island is the leading provider of healthcare insurance and information to Rhode Island residents, employers and workers. The functions supported include data processing, claims processing, marketing, finance and accounting, customer relations, provider and professional relations, and managed care. 

Responsibilities in the project: 

 	Designing Test cases after analyzing the specifications Documents.
 	Performed Unit and Integration Testing.
 	Performed Regression testing.
 	Reported the defects and validated defects.
 	Performed regression testing to validate the resolved defects on every build.
 	Updating of test cases based on the implementation changes.
 	Involved in weekly status reporting and official meetings with onsite.
 	Understanding the customer requirements and tracking the requirement changes in the test 
        cases to make sure that each of the requirements gets mapped to a test case.
 	And also includes training New Hires, explaining the entire plan provisions specific to the     
        client (HealthCare Domain).

contributors.headline: IT DevOps Competent Engineer at ING, COBOL Programmer, MicroFocus Developer, Azure fundamentals & ISTQB certified

projects.title: Bank of Ireland
projects.description:
BOI is a commercial bank operation in Ireland. It is a deposit-taker and a credit institution – it performed many central bank functions.

Responsibilities in the project: 
  
 	Code Analysis.
 	Enhancement/maintenance of the applications according to the client requirement
 	Coding, testing 
 	Preparing Tech specs, Design, system test log
 	Enhancement, developments and Testing of programs coded in PLASM as per the 
        requirements.
 	Working and implementing the code in the mainframe environment.
 	System studies, Architecture analysis.
